name: Sacred Ember
content:
Sacred Ember

An ancient temple complex where eternal flames dance in sacred braziers. Primary Objectives are flame altars. Secondary markers are prayer circles or offering pits. The air is warm with the heat of sacred fires.


Terrain Features:

  • Flame altars
  • Prayer circles
  • Offering pits
  • Sacred braziers

Atmosphere:

The air is warm and filled with the scent of incense and burning offerings. The crackle of eternal flames provides a constant background noise, and the light of sacred fires casts dancing shadows on ancient walls.
